topics.body:
_Imagine if this entire thread, and everyone who's a regular on it, is part of some sort of sitcom-type show either on TV or online._ 

Who'd be the main character(s)?
What roles would we all have?
What kind of episodes would we get ourselves into?
What's our show's rating?

Plus it's only 6 bucks as opposed to shorter, less interesting games that sell for 20 COUGHGONEHOMECOUGHSUNSETCOUGHCOUGH

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559eec5163687269cd0001f7#post_559eec5163687269cd0001f7
[bq="mariomarc"]How do I tell my parents I'm into a guy on the internet without it getting awkward
How do I talk
How do I[/bq]

If you can save enough for the trip just say you want to visit [ insert bear resident state ], you're old enough to go on things of your own, you pay your bills and taxes you work hard for what you say. You're an adult at this point. If anything, having some time with yourself is not something they should object. 

Plan accordingly, save enough money, and don't get intimidated. If it doesn't work between you two then bad luck but you weren't just in the corner thinking what could have been, you went and did everything to make it work.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559ef1b963687225b60006de#post_559ef1b963687225b60006de
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]I wonder something.
If a woman wanted to say the iconic TTGL phrase "Ore wo dare da to omotte yagaru" would she replace the "Ore" with "Atashi?"[/bq]

It can be both ways.

Atashi would be if the girl is pretty femenine (mostly adults or femenine teens) whereas Ore is pretty masculine. The neutral in this case (in case of teenagers as well) would be Boku
